title: [Large-scale] Language Learning Competency Strengthening Program Through Failure Analysis

context.additional_context: Aims to improve job-related language proficiency for current practitioners, combining smartphone-based learning with offline workshops in a limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce work-related language errors by 30% within four weeks
Learners can derive at least three effective language use strategies by analyzing failure cases
Learners can perform collaborative learning processes to correct language errors through peer feedback exchange with over 80% proficiency

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
